title.narrative: Humanitarian Aid to support drought victims in Ethiopia through WFP

description.narrative: Humanitarian assistance through WFP to Ethiopia supported by a total of EUR 1 000 000. Food security in Ethiopia is constantly in a vulnerable state due to dry climate general poverty of the population as well as large number of refugees from neighbouring countries. According to the common analysis by the Ethiopian government and the humanitarian organisations in the beginning of 2013 an estimated 2.4 million people are in need of humanitarian food assistance in 2013. WFP's protracted crisis operation provi des food assistance to two million beneficiaries. WFP also has a supplementary feeding programme benefitting one million people. In addition over 420 000 refugees are fully dependent on WFP's food assistance. By beginning of October the total funding gap f or WFP emergency operations until the end of the year is 169 million U.S. dollars.
